item.title: ParseArger, project does it all
item.description: If you find that there are too many commands to create a script and stuff, me too, project does it all !

item.title: ParseArger, completion, documentation and stuff
item.description: Learn all about the completion, documentation and supporting stuff for your scripts that you can generate with ParseArger.

item.title: ParseArger, more on Pos Opt and Flag
item.description: Options with default values ? Repeatable options or aliases maybe ? This is a deeper dive into parseArger’s arguments, options and flags generation.

item.title: ParseArger, generate and Parse
item.description: Deeper dive in parseArger generate and parse commands arguments and options.

item.title: ParseArger, create bash scripts you'll want to use
item.description: Generate standalone bash scripts with argument, option and flag parsing, documentation, completion and more !
